STATIC_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: エンチャント（クリーチャー）
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local attach_filter = Object():AttachmentFilter_Get() attach_filter:Clear() attach_filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE )

STATIC_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Creatures you control that are enchanted get +1/+1 and can’t be blocked except by creatures with defender.
Les créatures que vous contrôlez qui sont enchantées gagnent +1/+1 et elles ne peuvent être bloquées que par des créatures avec défenseur.
Las criaturas que controlas que están encantadas obtienen +1/+1 y no pueden ser bloqueadas excepto por criaturas con la habilidad de defensor.
Verzauberte Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, erhalten +1/+1 und können nur von Kreaturen mit der Verteidigerfähigkeit geblockt werden.
Le creature incantate che controlli prendono +1/+1 e non possono essere bloccate, tranne che da creature con difensore.
あなたがコントロールするエンチャントされている各クリーチャーは、それぞれ＋１/＋１の修整を受けるとともに防衛を持つクリーチャーによってしかブロックされない。
당신이 조종하는 생물 중 부여된 생물들은 +1/+1을 받고, 수비태세 능력을 가진 생물에게만 방어될 수 있다.
Существа под вашим контролем, являющиеся зачарованными, получают +1/+1 и могут быть заблокированы только существами со способностью Защитника.
As criaturas encantadas que você controla recebem +1/+1 e só podem ser bloqueadas por criaturas com defensor.
STATIC_ABILITY.FILTER: return (FilteredCard() ~= nil and FilteredCard():GetCardType():Test( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) ~= 0 and FilteredCard():GetZone() == (ZONE_IN_PLAY) and (FilteredCard():IsEnchanted() ~= 0) and FilteredCard():GetPlayer() == Object():GetPlayer())
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: if FilteredCard() ~= nil then local characteristics = FilteredCard():GetCurrentCharacteristics() if characteristics ~= nil then characteristics:Power_Add( 1 ) characteristics:Toughness_Add( 1 ) end end

SPELL_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ALLIED_ONLY, EffectController() )
SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local target_card = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if target_card ~= nil then Object():Enchant( target_card ) end

TRIGGERED_ABILITY.TRIGGER: if TriggerObject():IsEnchanted() ~= 0 then if SecondaryObject():GetCurrentCharacteristics():Characteristic_Get( CHARACTERISTIC_DEFENDER ) == 0 then return true end end return false
